content: sts increase d 86 86 86 90 90 90 sts next repeat short row 2 5 more times next short row 3 all sizes resolve dss as they appear slmm work body patt to m1 m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l work body patt to m3 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l turn make ds slm4 p3 slm3 p to m slm twice k1 or p1 turn make ds slm1 k3 slm2 work body patt to m3 slm3 k3 slm4 work body patt to mm slmm k to m1 m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l k to m3 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l k to mm next repeat short row 2 - 1 2 3 5 6 more times then repeat short row 3 once more now you have 162 174 186 202 226 238 sts 77 83 89 97 109 115 sts for front 79 85 91 99 111 117 sts for back and 3 sts for each shoulder cut yarn rmm slip the sts between mm and m4 on right hand needle to left hand needle then beg to work the front sts m4 to m1 back and forth place 79 85 91 99 111 117 back sts to the waste yarn front join yarn to the front with rs facing row 1 rs work body patt to end row 2 ws p to end repeat last 2 row 14 16 18 20 22 24 more times then repeat row 1 once cut yarn back place 3 shoulder sts between m1 and m2 m3 and m4 on waste yarn or stitch holder join yarn to the back with rs facing row 1 rs work body patt to end row 2 ws p to end repeat last 2 row 19 21 23 25 27 29 more times next row 1 rs co 1 st using the knitted cast on work body pattern to end co 1 st using backward-loop method next row 2 ws p to end repeat next row 1 once more do not cut yarn 83 89 95 103 115 121 sts ©︎ 2019 yuko shimizu 4 join the front and the back using working yarn co 3 5 3 3 3 5 st using backward-loop method pmm co 1 sts using backward-loop method k the front sts co 4 6 4 4 4 6 sts using backward-loop method k to mm 168 184 192 208 232 248 sts 79 85 91 99 111 117 sts for front and 89 99 101 109 121 131 sts for back body round 1 slmm work body patt to mm repeat last round 33 35 37 39 43 47 more times or to your desired length rmm cut yarn slip next 1 4 3 3 5 8 sts to right hand needle next 77 77 85 93 101 101 sts will be worked as front transfer rest of 91 107 107 115 131 147 back sts to waste yarn or spare needle now 77 77 85 93 101 101 sts on needle beg
